Player History
Drafted in 4th round, 53rd overall pick, by Boston in 2016...
Had first career hit on 4/22/2017, off Jordon Tookes (KC)...
Earned first career win on 5/1/2017...
Hit first career homerun on 5/27/2018, off Dave Gurrola (NY)...
Won Player of the Week award on 5/29/2018, winning 2 games with a 1.76 ERA...
Won Pitcher of the Month award on 5/1/2019, going 5-0, 0.76...
Injured on 5/5/2019 with a Torn Ligament Elbow, out for full season...
1/31/2021: Gets a new one-year contract worth $2,385,714 through salary arbitration...
1/31/2022: Gets a new one-year contract worth $2,385,714 through salary arbitration...
1/31/2023: Gets a new one-year contract worth $2,385,714 through salary arbitration...
Won Player of the Week award on 7/17/2023, winning 2 games with a 1.98 ERA...
9/16/2023: Signed a contract extension with Boston, $11,000,000 per year, for 2 years.
Won Player of the Week award on 7/10/2024, winning 2 games with a 1.13 ERA...
Won World Series with Boston in 2024...
8/19/2025: Signed a contract extension with Boston, $11,000,000 per year, for 2 years.
